attributes.action: Make Covid-19 vaccination centres open for 24 hours.
attributes.additional_details: This would mean that there is more available access to vaccination centres for everyone and that the process of vaccinating the population is done at a quicker rate.
attributes.background: The Government should fund vaccination centres to be open for 24 hours to increase the number of people who have been vaccinated.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
